title: Peaceful 3 Bedroom 5 minutes Walk to Campus!!!!! Avl 8/1/22 W-D
posting_body: ['description', 'Top Floor 3 Bedroom Available Aug 1', 'Property Address', '2231 Ward St | Unit D | Berkeley, CA 94705', 'Available: 08/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'Kasa Properties Sign up for a tour today!:', '<URL>', 'Description', 'Sign up for a tour today!', '<URL>', 'Nestled on a quiet street in Southside Berkeley, 2231 Ward St is a small, pet-friendly, 5-Unit building w/ off-street parking available, washer and dryers on site, bike storage, and additional storage.', '2231 Ward is perfect for undergrads and grads looking for a smaller building in a quieter neighborhood that is still close to campus!', 'Just 0.6mi from UCB Campus, 1.0mi from UCB School of Law, 0.4mi from Berkeley Bowl and 0.5mi from Whole Foods.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Top Floor', 'Deck', 'Granite Countertop', 'Floor-to-Ceiling Windows', '3 Private Bedrooms', 'Bathroom w/ Shower Tub', 'Cable-ready', 'Hardwood floor', 'Tile floor', 'BUILDING FEATURES', 'Seismically Retrofit', 'On-street parking', 'Off-street parking', 'Coin-Operated Laundry', 'LEASE TERMS', 'Lease Term: 12 months', '3 Persons allowed.', 'Add $150/mo per person to rent exceeding 3.', 'Pet: $75-100/mo per pet added to the rent.', 'Residents pay all utilities', 'Parking is available for an additional $100/month, including an EV charging space', 'Smoking is not permitted on the premises.', "NOTE: The City of Berkeley's Fair Chance Housing Ordinance requires that rental housing providers display this notice to applicants - https://www.cityofberkeley.info/uploadedFiles/Housing/Level_3_-_General/Fair_Chance%20Notice_to_Applicants_and_Tenants_English_Spanish_Chinese.pdf", 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 3BD/1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 803', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $4,295.00', 'Available: 08/01/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $8,590.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
